ygData.subject: Re: the dead
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes!!  Please tell me what level I have to be in order to go to this camp. I m a Troll so I really don t care how many goodies hate me.  I m going to try to
ygData.messageBody:
Yes!! Please tell me what level I have to be in order to go to this camp.
I'm a Troll so I really don't care how many "goodies" hate me. I'm going to
try to kill all of them I come across eventually anyway. *grins evilly* Any
help would be appreciated.

Drizzen, Troll Shadowknight,
Chosen of Innoruuk,
Fennin Ro
-----Original Message-----
From: Princess Xaera <xaera@...>
To: shadowknight@onelist.com <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, September 27, 1999 10:09 AM
Subject: [shadowknight] the dead


>From: "Princess Xaera" <xaera@...>
>
>I found another way to increase faction with "the dead" for those that
care.
>
>Enroute to Unrest in Cauldron, there's a camp of goodie tooshoes. Polish
>them off and you're on your way to making "the dead" very happy. On a side
>note, other people are going to hate you.
>
>>-=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
>-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
>
